name: ar-drone-png-stream
description: HTTP png stream from nodecopter using multipart/x-mixed-replace
readme: # ar-drone-png-stream #### *HTTP png stream from nodecopter using `multipart/x-mixed-replace`.* ### Install npm install ar-drone-png-stream ### Usage: `client` should be an instance of [`ar-drone`](https://github.com/felixge/node-ar-drone) var arDrone = require('ar-drone'); var client = arDrone.createClient(); require('ar-drone-png-stream')(client, { port: 8000 }); When it is running open the browser at `http://localhost:8000` or include this HTML in a page
